quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
name: Vince Lombardi

quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
name: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
name: Aristotle Onassis

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: With self-discipline most anything is possible.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Everyone here has the sense that right now is one of those moments when we are influencing the future.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
name: Robin Williams

quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!
name: Anne Frank

quote: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
name: Tony Robbins

quote: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I dwell in possibility.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
name: Amelia Barr

quote: The only journey is the one within.
name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge.
name: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
name: John Muir

quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live.
name: Anatole France

quote: Today is the only day. Yesterday is gone.
name: John Wooden

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
name: Walt Disney

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
name: Mark Twain

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: We may encounter defeats but we must not be defeated.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: There's a way to do it better - find it.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Well done is better than well said.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Never, never, never give up.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: After a storm comes a calm.
name: Matthew Henry

quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
name: Ralph Marston

quote: Who seeks shall find.
name: Sophocles

quote: Amazing how we can light tomorrow with today.
name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Believe with all of your heart that you will do what you were made to do.
name: Orison Swett Marden

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not an act but a habit.
name: Aristotle

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
name: John Muir

quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Your imagination is your preview of life's coming attractions.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Imagination is the eye of the soul.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: You cannot depend on your eyes when your imagination is our of focus.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Go confident in the direction of your dreams. Love the life you have imagined.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past
name: Patrick Henry

quote: A skillful man reads his dreams for self-knowledge, yet not the details but the quality.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I have found power in the mysteries of thought.
name: Euripides

quote: Thoughts are but dreams till their effects be tried.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Every man has a train of thought on which he rides when he is alone.
name: Joseph Fort Newton

quote: Learning without thought it labor lost; thought without learning is perilous.
name: Confucius

quote: The universe is change, our life is what our thoughts make it.
name: Marcus Auerlius

quote: Thought rules the world.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Thinking is the talking of the soul with itself.
name: Plato

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
name: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Heaven never helps the man who will not act.
name: Sophocles

quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
name: Aristotle

quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
name: Florence Nightingale

quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
name: Amelia Earhart

quote: Life isn't about getting and having, it's about giving and being.
name: Kevin Kruse

quote: We become what we think about.
name: Earl Nightingale

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
name: Buddha

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
name: Stephen Covey

quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
name: Henry Ford

quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing.  That’s why we recommend it daily.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
name: Confucius

quote: You become what you believe.
name: Oprah

quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
name: Norman Vaughan

quote: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: Around here, however, we don’t look backwards for very long. We keep moving forward, opening up new doors and doing new things, because we're curious… and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.
name: Walt Disney

quote: It's kind of fun to do the impossible.
name: Walt Disney

quote: The miracle is this: The more we share, the more we have.
name: Leonard Nimoy

quote: If you don't build your dream, someone else will hire you to help them build theirs.
name: Dhirubhai Ambani

quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
name: Mark Caine

quote: When I dare to be powerful – to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.
name: Audre Lorde

quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.
name: Thomas A. Edison

quote: If you don’t value your time, neither will others. Stop giving away your time and talents. Value what you know & start charging for it.
name: Kim Garst

quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Let him who would enjoy a good future waste none of his present.
name: Roger Babson

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
name: Muhatma Gandhi

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack of will.
name: Vince Lombardi

quote: It is our choices, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
name: J.K Rowling

quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
name: Harriet Tubman

quote: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I feear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
name: Bruce Lee

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
name: Bruce Lee

quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: If you genuinely want something, don’t wait for it – teach yourself to be impatient.
name: Gurbaksh Chahal

quote: If you want to make a permanent change, stop focusing on the size of your problems and start focusing on the size of you!
name: T. Harv Eker

quote: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
name: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: You can’t connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. You have to trust in something – your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.
name: William James

quote: The real opportunity for sucess lies within the person and not in the job.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: Nurture your mind with great thoughts. To believe in the heroic makes heroes.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
name: Lao Tzu
